title: The Tale of the Body Thief
description: old cover for Anne Rice's The Tale of the Body Thief with ISBN 0-345-38475-XFor centuries, Lestat -- vampire-hero, enchanter, seducer of mortals -- has been a courted prince in the dark and flourishing universe of the living dead. Now Lestat is alone. And suddenly all his vampire rationale -- everything he has come to believe and feel safe with -- is called into question. In his overwhelming need to destroy his doubts and his loneliness, Lestat embarks on the most dangerous enterprise he has undertaken in all the danger-haunted years of his long existence...
author: Anne Rice
